title: The Jenny McCarthy Show
overview: VH1 is getting ready to shake up your Friday nights with the hilarious and totally uncensored The Jenny McCarthy Show. Jenny McCarthy will be bringing her over-the-top comedic sensibilities and classic self-deprecating humor to VH1 with her pop culture-based talk show. Every Friday night Jenny is throwing the coolest party in town. From New York City, Jenny and her celebrity guests will serve up the week's juiciest pop culture stories. Complete with a resident DJ, exclusive bottle service and a live audience, Jenny makes sure the whole room is involved and absolutely nothing is off-limits.
